text.section:
Sec. 13-23. Penalty for violation.
In addition to the penalty provided by or any other penalty, any person who violates the provisions hereof or the conditions and limitations imposed in a County license and/or user permit shall be deemed to have violated this chapter, and the County license and/or user permit may be revoked by the Director of the Public Works Department; provided an appeal may be filed pursuant to or(e) hereof as applicable.
